choices.label: (8) PPFG, primary progressive freezing of gait (PPFG)
(9) PAFG, pure akinesia with freezing of gait (PAFG)
(2) STAGE 2 = Bilateral disease, without impairment of balance.
(2.5) STAGE 2.5 = Mild bilateral disease, with retropulsion but recovery on pull test.
(3) STAGE 3 = Mild to moderate bilateral disease; some postural instability; physically independent.
(4) STAGE 4 = Severe disability; still able to walk or stand unassisted.
(5) STAGE 5 = Wheelchair bound or bedridden unless aided.

choices.label: I have not experienced such a feeling or episode over the past month (0 pts)

name: nfogq_q1
label: 1. Did you experience "freezing episodes" over the past month?

choices.label: Not often, about once a week (1)
Very often, more than once a day (3)

name: nfogq_q2
label: 2.     How frequently do you experience freezing episodes?

choices.label: Not often, about once a week (2)
Very often, more than once a day (4)

name: nfogq_q3
label: 3.    How frequently do you experience freezing episodes during turning?

choices.label: Very long, unable to walk for more than 30 s. (4)

name: nfogq_q4
label: 4.    How long is your longest freezing episode during turning?

choices.label: Not often, about once a week (2)
Very often, more than once a day (4)

name: nfogq_q5
label: 5.    How frequently do you experience episodes of freezing when initiating the first step?

choices.label: Very long, unable to walk for more than 30 s. (4 pts)

name: nfogq_q6
label: 6.      How long is your longest freezing episode when initiating the first step?

name: nfogq_q7
label: 7. How disturbing are the freezing episodes for your daily walking?

name: nfogq_q8
label: 8. Do the freezing episodes cause feelings of insecurity and fear of falling?

choices.label: Not at all, I continue doing things as normal (0 pts)
Mildly, I avoid only few daily activities (1 pt)
Moderately, I avoid a significant amount (about half) of daily activities (2 pts)
Severely, I am very restricted in carrying out most daily activities (3 pts)

name: updrs_hystage
label: V. Modified Hoehn and Yahr Staging

choices.label: 90% - Completely independent. Able to do all chores with some degree of slowness, difficulty and impairment. Might take twice as long. Beginning to be aware of difficulty.
80% - Completely independent in most chores. Takes twice as long. Conscious of difficulty and slowness.
70% - Not completely independent. More difficulty with some chores. Three to four times as long in some. Must spend a large part of the day with chores.
60% - Some dependency. Can do most chores, but exceedingly slowly and with much effort. Errors; some impossible.
50% -More dependent. Help with half, slower, etc. Difficulty with everything.
40% - Very dependent. Can assist with all chores, but few alone.
30% - With effort, now and then does a few chores alone or begins alone. Much help needed.
20% - Nothing alone. Can be a slight help with some chores. Severe invalid.
0% - Vegetative functions such as swallowing, bladder and bowel functions are not functioning. Bedridden.
90% - Completely independent. Able to do all chores with some degree of slowness, difficulty and impairment. Might take twice as long. Beginning to be aware of difficulty.
80% - Completely independent in most chores. Takes twice as long. Conscious of difficulty and slowness.
70% - Not completely independent. More difficulty with some chores. Three to four times as long in some. Must spend a large part of the day with chores.
60% - Some dependency. Can do most chores, but exceedingly slowly and with much effort. Errors; some impossible.
50% -More dependent. Help with half, slower, etc. Difficulty with everything.
40% - Very dependent. Can assist with all chores, but few alone.
30% - With effort, now and then does a few chores alone or begins alone. Much help needed.
20% - Nothing alone. Can be a slight help with some chores. Severe invalid.
0% - Vegetative functions such as swallowing, bladder and bowel functions are not functioning. Bedridden.

(3) Tends to fall back and may have to try more than one time, but can get up without help.
